title: Angewandte Chemie: International Edition in English
additional-note: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Penn's catalog record for this serial mentions a New York as well as a German publication location, and prices in US dollars are mentioned in the page footers. Some content may be translated from the German edition.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Mallika Sircar for copyright research on this title.
